transArray.content: The room is clean and hygienic, the service staff have very good attitudes, the breakfast is rich and nutritious, and there is a dedicated office area in the lobby. It is very suitable for business trips. I recommend it to everyone

Dear guest, hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. The products and services provided by the hotel are of reliable quality. We always put hygiene first. We are very happy to see your recognition of the hotel staffâ€™s service and can give you Bringing a pleasant stay is a great encouragement to us. The hotel's breakfast time is from 7:00 to 11:00. The Chinese and Western buffet breakfast is diverse, nutritious and delicious. Freshly cooked noodles, hot noodles and small pastries will satisfy you. The special delicacies without leaving home, the hotel's attentive service, and the lobby renovation style are completely customized for our business guests, making it convenient for guests to meet with guests. There is also free coffee in the front lobby for guests to use, providing guests with a safe and comfortable stay. The environment is our constant goal. All the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel look forward to your next stay, thank you! General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
